body.name: Codeage Liposomal Vitamin C 1500mg with Zinc, Elderberry, Citrus Bioflavonoids Grapefruit, Lemon, Orange Powder, Quercetin & Rose Hips Fruit – Vegan Supplement - Non-GMO, Vegan Pills - 2 Pack
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 3 mins
features: Multi sources of vitamin C: Codeage Liposomal Vitamin C + is everything a modern vitamin C should be. One, it’s a high dose of 1,500mg vitamin C. Two, it offers a high amount of zinc. Three, it has wonderful citrus bioflavonoids with grapefruit, lemon, and orange powders. Four, it features elderberry powder. Five, it contains quercetin. Six, it provides rosehips extracts. Last but not least, it comes in a vitamin C liposomal delivery format. 2 months supply.*

Liposomal vitamin C formulation – Codeage liposomal vitamin C combines Non-GMO sunflower phosphatidylcholine complex (from lecithin) to help encapsulate the vitamin C inside microscopic phospholipid spheres.*

10 different ingredients: This vegan and daily vitamin C dietary supplement offers 10 different ingredients all-in-one: Vitamin C, Zinc, Alpha Lipoic Acid, Citrus Bioflavonoid Complex: Grapefruit Powder Fruit, Lemon Powder Peel, Orange Powder Fruit; Quercetin Dihydrate, Rosehips Extract Fruit, Elderberry Powder Fruit for a unique vitamin C complex and an alternative to liquid vitamins.
Citrus bioflavonoids - The addition of grapefruit, lemon and orange powder adds important sources of vitamin C to these fat soluble vitamins pills.

Plant based & vegan vitamins: Made in the USA in a cGMP facility and third party tested. Codeage vitamin C supplement is non-GMO. It contains no dairy or gluten. The formula is also soy-free, and offers vegetarian vitamins.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Additional information: 2-month supply of liposomal vitamin C with elderberry, quercetin, rose hips, zinc and citrus bioflavonoids. Codeage Liposomal Vitamin C capsules supplement features 1,500 mg of vitamin C per serving and comes with zinc mineral. Codeage liposomal vitamin C also features a citrus bioflavonoids complex with grapefruit, lemon and orange powders. It contains elderberry powder, quercetin supplement, rosehips extracts, and alpha lipoic acid all-in-one. Manufactured in the USA, vegan, and non-GMO. Codeage Liposomal Vitamin C pills formula and dietary supplement is vegan and non-GMO. This formula is also keto-friendly, soy-free, dairy-free, and gluten-free. Codeage vitamin C with capsules supplement is also free of artificial ingredients. Each bottle of Codeage vitamin C supplements bottle comes with 2 months of supply. Codeage liposomal Vitamin C supplement offers an innovative liposomal delivery method using liposomes from non-GMO sunflower oil and sunflower lecithin phospholipids with phosphatidylcholine.Codeage Liposomal Vitamin C formula leverages liposomes to offer a modern delivery for nutrients and supplementation.* What's vitamin C? Vitamin C is a water-soluble vitamin found in many fruits and vegetables. It can help the body support a healthy immune system and play a role in the skin.* This is one of the reasons people might consume vitamins for skin. Vitamin C may also help to produce collagen, which is part of our skin elasticity. A diet that includes plenty of fruits and vegetables can provide enough vitamin C to support skin health and wellness.* Part or all the ingredients provided in this liposomal vitamin C ascorbic acid formula can be received in adequate or extra amounts from food and regular diet alone. Individual results may vary and depend on a lot of factors, including age, health conditions, diet, genetic markup, lifestyle, physical activity and regular exercise. This vitamin C capsules formula offers an alternative to vitamin C tablets or vitamin C powder. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Liposomal is the best form to take vitamins in. It is the form that is easier for the body to absorb and allows more drug to get to target areas of the body. It contains 1500mg per serving with is 3 capsules a day. The best way for this to take is with food so it will not irritate the stomach and consume it 3 times a day for continuous release and immune support. I take it in the morning, lunch and dinner time. The capsule has this odd smell I cannot distinguish. The capsule is easier to swallow as it is clear coated and doesn’t have a bad taste. I usually pair this with glutathione capsule of lower dosage for more immune support especially this Covid crisis.Price point is acceptable.

reviews.reviewText: I cannot say enough about this brand. They are made well, and to my standards. Working out perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All the cold/flu fighting vitamins you need
reviews.reviewText: This vitamin C is packed with all the cold/flu fighting vitamins you need. I use it year round and if I need an extra boost of added protection at certain times, I’ll take two in a day. I love that there is Zinc, Quercetin, Elderberry and rose hips. Also being vegan, I like that there are no yucky fillers or gelatin.
Good product as described by the seller.
C'est le meilleur vitamines pour moiUne pilule par jour c'est du vrai vitamine dérive du fruit naturel en plus il'ya autres vitamines avec

Without doing regular bloodwork and comparing and contrasting levels overtime it’s hard to give a decent review on vitamins and supplements. That said it’s a decent quantity for a decent price. Still more expensive than I’m happy with to purchase regularly. If I have opportunity to do thorough bloodwork and evaluate levels I will update this review to give more clarity to their efficacy later. I’d still recommend this product if your looking for a natural boost.

reviews.reviewTitle: I was skeptical but so far so good
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried other liposomal vitamin C and the capsules are different from this one. But I haven’t gotten sick while taking this, take in consideration I ALWAYS get sick when people around me get sick and during winter always sick. This is my third bottle and I feel really good!
Just started using. Certainly pleased so far. High amount of C and good price. Will continue to buy 😀
